header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Local authority trees outside ANON’s house, Leeds Triathlon and disruption on 12 June, About selling things to a shop in Harehills, Leeds, Other shops in Leeds, Bicycle, Bags for Life carrier bags Local authority recycling and bin issues
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, complaining, anecdote telling, making arrangements

and onto the pavements
